titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: Non-standard card, seems to be written on some other kind of paper <*> "Eliz. Essays" = crossed out, unclear s2: Calendar page for 22 Nov 1939, have transcribed additional writing on it s3: Calendar page for 12 Dec 1939, have transcribed additional writing on it s4: Writing on verso is upside down
